parameters.name: searchStr
parameters.description: String to search for templates by name. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for templates whose name start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for templates whose name contain the string, 3) string - Searches for templates whose name is an exact match for the string

schema.description: String to search for templates by name. The string must contain at least one character. Three search methods are supported: 1) string* - Searches for templates whose name start with the string, 2) *string* - Searches for templates whose name contain the string, 3) string - Searches for templates whose name is an exact match for the string

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: number of templates to be retrieved Range 1-50, @DEFAULT 50@

schema.description: number of templates to be retrieved Range 1-50, @DEFAULT 50@

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: the corresponding folder to be fetched

schema.description: the corresponding folder to be fetched

get.description: List the placeholders supported in emailTemplates

post.description: Render an exisiting Template into reply

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: The recordType of the template can be @contacts@, @accounts@, @tickets@, @products@, @tasks@
The from email of the template
To get placeholders for this module.Allowed values are @tickets@,@tasks@,@contacts@,@accounts@,@products@,@solutions@,@calls@,@events@

value.subject: My support Template
value.body: lakshmansupport1lakshmanvigneshMEOW Ticket newuser+1105/30/2016 09:57 AMI am containing a content

value.templateName: Notify contact when a comment is added
value.subject: [##${Cases.Request Id}##] ${Cases.Recent Comment By} has commented to your ticket
value.body:
Dear ${Cases.Contact Name},

${Cases.Recent Comment By} has left the following comment on your ticket, #${Cases.Request Id} ${Cases.Subject}.

${Cases.Recent Comment}

Regards,
${Organization.Organization Name} Support Team.

${Cases.CUSTOMER_PORTAL_BUTTON}

value.templateName: Notify contact when a comment is edited
value.subject: [##${Cases.Request Id}##] ${Cases.Recent Comment By} has updated comment in your ticket
value.body:
Dear ${Cases.Contact Name},

${Cases.Recent Comment By} has updated the following comment in your ticket, #${Cases.Request Id} ${Cases.Subject}.

${Cases.Recent Comment}

Regards,
${Organization.Organization Name} Support Team.

${Cases.CUSTOMER_PORTAL_BUTTON}

value.templateName: Notify contact when a comment is deleted
value.subject: [##${Cases.Request Id}##] ${Cases.Recent Comment By} has deleted comment in your ticket
value.body:
Dear ${Cases.Contact Name},

${Cases.Recent Comment By} has deleted the following comment in your ticket, #${Cases.Request Id} ${Cases.Subject}.

${Cases.Recent Comment}

Regards,
${Organization.Organization Name} Support Team.

${Cases.CUSTOMER_PORTAL_BUTTON}

value.templateName: Notify agent when a comment is deleted
value.subject: [##${Cases.Request Id}##] ${Cases.Recent Comment By} has deleted a comment in the ticket
value.body:
${Cases.Recent Comment By} has deleted the following comment in the ticket, #${Cases.Request Id} ${Cases.Subject}.

${Cases.Recent Comment}


${Cases.SUPPORT_PORTAL_BUTTON}

departmentId.name: departmentId
departmentId.description: the corresponding department to be fetched

schema.description: the corresponding department to be fetched

value.subject: My Template Subject
value.body:
Dear ${Cases.Contact Name},

Your ticket has been created with the ticket ID ${Cases.Request Id} and subject "${Cases.Subject}"

Someone from our customer service team will review it and respond shortly.

Regards,
${Organization.Organization Name} Support Team.

${Cases.CUSTOMER_PORTAL_BUTTON}
